name: drenso/symfony-shared
description: This bundle contains commonly shared extensions between our projects.

suggest.doctrine/orm: Needed to use the Database traits
suggest.jms/serializer-bundle: Needed to use the Database traits
suggest.stof/doctrine-extensions-bundle: Needed to use the Blameable trait
suggest.symfony/console: Needed to use the action security command
suggest.symfony/doctrine-bridge: Needed to use the HiddenEntityType, the Database traits and the action security command
suggest.symfony/security-core: Needed to use the Blameable subscriber
suggest.symfony/validator: Use EntityValidationFailedException for nice exception messages when validation failed
